籤詩版本二:
Inyanga ikhanyisa esibhakabhakeni kuthuleke endlini, kungazelele muntu ngishaywe amafu nenkungu ngivele ngiquleke.
Sicela uthandazele ukuthula kwengqondo, Yunxia Powder, shintsha i-charity ngalesi sikhathi, futhi ubhale incwadi endlini.
詩意:
Kule hexagram, amafu nenkungu amboze inyanga.
Gcina izindlela zakudala noma izinto zingahambi kahle.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Wenxiu wabulawa
Phakathi nenkathi yamaJiajing yoBukhosi BakwaMing, uHe Wenxiu waqanjwa ngongqongqoshe abangamaqili futhi umndeni wakhe wawusenkingeni.UHe Wenxiu wasizwa uLan Ying, iNdlovukazi kaNdunankulu, futhi bobabili bashada ngasese. U-He Wenxiu wamangalelwa ngamanga yisixhwanguxhwangu u-Zhang Tang futhi waboshwa. Kamuva wahlengwa futhi waba umbusi ngemva kokuphasa izivivinyo. U-Wenxiu uthole ukuthi ukuphi u-Wang Lanying futhi wagqoka njengombhuli ukuze azi. Laba bobabili bagcina behlangene, futhi uZhang Tang wabulawa.
聖意: Angikhululekile ekhaya, ngithandazela ukuvikeleka, ubunzima bezezimali, ubunzima bebhizinisi, izinkinga zomshado, ukushoda kweLiujia, abahamba ngezinyawo abavimbe amasimu, ukulimala kwemisundu kasilika, ukulimala kwemfuyo, abantu abalahlekile, amacala omphakathi, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekile, ukugula, ithuna lasentabeni yaseYan'an kufanele zilungiswe
